reviewText: This is the single best film I have ever seen. I've seen it in the theater about 6 times and finally broke down and bought it. It's not as good seeing it on a TV, even if you've got a huge screen it's not an IMAX, but it's still easily one of the greatest films ever made. The sheer mind-boggling effort of just making the footage is almost inconceivable to me, what these people went through was staggering. It's beautiful, it's compelling and you should damn well watch it.
I got the product when i was told i would get it, but when opened it was the wrong movie. I paid almost 50 dollars for one DVD and I get the wrong one. I hope its easy to return it.
